fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: Regulation (EU) nr. 528/2012, Regulation (EU) 1107/2009, Directive 2009/128/EG, Regulation (EG) 1069/2009, Regulation (EU) 142/2011, Directive 91/676/EEG, internationale detachering, Regulation (EU) 167/2013, Regulation (EU) 2015/68, Regulation (EU) 2015/69, Regulation (EU) 2015/208, Regulation (EU) 1322/2014, Directive 2014/45/EU, Directive 2014/47/EU, Directive 2014/24/EU, Klimate change, ES-TRIN 2017, circular economy, nature, common agricultural policy
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Brancheorganisatie voor ondernemers in groen, grond en infra. Doel: behartigen van belangen van de sector en de lidbedrijven, beïnvloeden overheidsbeleid op Europees, nationaal en regionaal niveau, de branche op een hoger niveau brengen, het houden van bijeenkomsten, publiceren t.b.v. kennisoverdracht, netwerkvorming, sectorontwikkelingen sectorprofilering.
